name: Storyblok Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Storyblok Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Storyblok API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Storyblok API | (必填项)

source.name: source
source.description: Pick where your data comes from, Content or Management API
source.natural_language_description: 参数名: Source | 作用: Pick where your data comes from, Content or Management API | 默认值: contentApi

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: story

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many stories

identifier.name: identifier
identifier.description: The ID or slug of the story to get
identifier.natural_language_description: 参数名: Identifier | 作用: The ID or slug of the story to get | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}

space.name: space
space.description: The name of the space. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
space.natural_language_description: 参数名: Space Name or ID | 作用: The name of the space. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

storyId.name: storyId
storyId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Story ID | 作用: Numeric ID of the story | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: releaseId (值: None) - Numeric ID of release
language (值: None) - Language code to publish the story individually (must be enabled in the space settings)
